participant_1.background:
I have a crib in my home gym for when my nieces and nephews come to visit.
i am gay but i have not told my parents yet.
I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog.
i like to grow my own herbs and vegetables in my garden.
I can't live without my friends, especially when we go out for pizza together.

participant_2.background:
My heart is full of love for my family and friends.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I took my dogs on a hike in the mountains.
i love kids.
my favorite season is winter.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks! How about you?
I am doing well, thanks! I am just getting ready to go out and get some groceries.
Nice! I love to go grocery shopping. What are you looking forward to getting?
I am looking forward to getting some fresh vegetables for my garden. I love to grow my own herbs and vegetables.
That is awesome! I would love to have a garden but I live in an apartment.
You can still have a garden, even if you live in an apartment! There are lots of great container gardening options.
I never thought of that! That is a great idea.
I am glad I could help! What are some of your favorite things to do in the winter?
I love to go skiing and snowboarding. I also love to spend time with my family and friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun in the winter! I love to go skiing too. I am not very good at it, but I have a lot of fun.
The best part about skiing is not being good at it! It is a great way to get exercise and have fun at the same time.
I totally agree! I also love the feeling of the snow on my face. It is so refreshing.
Me too! I love the way the snow makes everything look so clean and new.
I think we would be great friends! We have a lot in common.
I think so too! We should definitely get together sometime.
That would be awesome! I will let you know when I am free.
